title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 05, 2024

items.title: Awesome Code Review
items.content_text:
### Academic Papers

*   [Characteristics of Useful Code Reviews: An Empirical Study at Microsoft (Bosu, Greiler, Bird, 2015)](https://www.michaelagreiler.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Characteristics-Of-Useful-Comments.pdf) This paper reports the findings of a large scale qualitative and quantitative study focusing on understanding which code review comments are considered useful by developers.

### Tools

*   [PullNotifier](https://www.pullnotifier.com/) Improve pull request visibility and overall productivity for dev teams using Github and Slack.
items.content_html:
Academic Papers

  • Characteristics of Useful Code Reviews: An Empirical Study at Microsoft (Bosu, Greiler, Bird, 2015) This paper reports the findings of a large scale qualitative and quantitative study focusing on understanding which code review comments are considered useful by developers.

Tools

  • PullNotifier Improve pull request visibility and overall productivity for dev teams using Github and Slack.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Builders / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-env-builder (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/igorissen/angular-env-builder) - Builder to generate `src/environments/environment.ts` file based on your environment variables.

### Data Grids / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ZingGrid](https://www.zinggrid.com/docs/integrations/js-frameworks-&-libs/angular) - [ZingGrid (‚≠ê92)](https://github.com/ZingGrid/zinggrid) is a JavaScript Web Component Library that allows developers to include interactive data tables in their web applications. The library can also be used in popular frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue, jQuery, and many more!
items.content_html:
Builders / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-env-builder (‚≠ê2) - Builder to generate src/environments/environment.ts file based on your environment variables.

Data Grids / Google Developer Experts

  • ZingGrid - ZingGrid (‚≠ê92) is a JavaScript Web Component Library that allows developers to include interactive data tables in their web applications. The library can also be used in popular frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue, jQuery, and many more!

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### GTFS Analysis Tools / Rust

*   [GTFS Display](https://codeberg.org/dancingCycle/gtfs-display) - Analyse, monitor and maintain GTFS data ([Example instances](https://www.swingbe.de/activity/gtfs-display/)).

### GTFS Realtime Utilities / Rust

*   [GTFS Realtime Display](https://codeberg.org/dancingCycle/gtfs-rt-display) - Analyse, monitor and maintain GTFS Realtime data. [Example instances](https://www.swingbe.de/activity/gtfs-rt-display/)
items.content_html:
GTFS Analysis Tools / Rust

  • GTFS Display - Analyse, monitor and maintain GTFS data (Example instances).

GTFS Realtime Utilities / Rust

  • GTFS Realtime Display - Analyse, monitor and maintain GTFS Realtime data. Example instances

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Tutorials / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [GraphQL with Go](https://hasura.io/learn/graphql/backend-stack/languages/go/) - Learn how to create a Go GraphQL server and client with code generation. Also includes creating REST endpoints.
items.content_html:
Tutorials / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • GraphQL with Go - Learn how to create a Go GraphQL server and client with code generation. Also includes creating REST endpoints.

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### Tracking

*   [Dawarich (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/Freika/dawarich) - Self-hosted alternative to Google Location History.

### Android-Based

*   [GrapheneOS](https://grapheneos.org/) - GrapheneOS is an open source privacy and security focused mobile OS with Android app compatibility. Only **Google Pixel** phones are supported.
*   [CalyxOS](https://calyxos.org/) - Privacy by Design ROM. Offers better security than LineageOS or Replicant.
*   [LineageOS](https://lineageos.org/) - A free and open-source operating system for various devices, based on the Android mobile platform.
    *   [DivestOS](https://divestos.org) - LineageOS fork with increased security and privacy.
*   [Replicant](https://www.replicant.us/) - Replicant is a fully free Android distribution running on several devices.
items.content_html:
Tracking

  • Dawarich (‚≠ê5.5k) - Self-hosted alternative to Google Location History.

Android-Based

  • GrapheneOS - GrapheneOS is an open source privacy and security focused mobile OS with Android app compatibility. Only Google Pixel phones are supported.
  • CalyxOS - Privacy by Design ROM. Offers better security than LineageOS or Replicant.
  • LineageOS - A free and open-source operating system for various devices, based on the Android mobile platform.
    • DivestOS - LineageOS fork with increased security and privacy.
  • Replicant - Replicant is a fully free Android distribution running on several devices.

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Machine Learning

*   [cl-chroma (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/atgreen/cl-chroma) - the vector DB interface.

### Mobile

*   [cl-all (‚≠ê21)](https://github.com/shinmera/cl-all) - A script to run Lisp snippets in multiple implementations. This allows you to quickly compare implementation behaviour and differences. [zlib](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Zlib).

### Running scripts / Third-party APIs

*   üëç [Roswell (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/roswell/roswell#scripting-with-roswell) - a script installer and launcher, that makes it easy to distribute Lisp scripts and programs. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
    *   *compiles a binary under the hood*
*   [CIEL (‚≠ê388)](https://github.com/ciel-lang/CIEL/) - CIEL Is an Extended Lisp is a collection of dozens of libraries useful for mundane tasks (HTTP, JSON, regexps‚Ä¶). \[unclear licence]
    *   It also comes as a binary that is able to run scripts from sources. Scripts that use the built-in libraries start fast without a compilation step.
    *   *in beta as of 2024*
*   NEW in 2024 [kiln (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/ruricolist/kiln) - an infrastructure (managing a hidden multicall binary) to make Lisp scripting efficient and ergonomic. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
    *   Kiln makes it practical to write very small scripts. Kiln scripts are fast and cheap to the point where it makes sense to expose even small pieces of Lisp functionality to the shell.

### Other scripting utilities / Third-party APIs

*   [clawk (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/sharplispers/clawk) - an AWK implementation embedded into Common Lisp, to search files for lines and perform specified actions on its fields. BSD-style.
*   [lqn (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/inconvergent/lqn) -  query language and terminal utility for querying and transforming Lisp, JSON and other text files. written in Common Lisp. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
items.content_html:
Machine Learning

  • cl-chroma (‚≠ê8) - the vector DB interface.

Mobile

  • cl-all (‚≠ê21) - A script to run Lisp snippets in multiple implementations. This allows you to quickly compare implementation behaviour and differences. zlib.

Running scripts / Third-party APIs

  • üëç Roswell (‚≠ê1.8k) - a script installer and launcher, that makes it easy to distribute Lisp scripts and programs. MIT.
    • compiles a binary under the hood
  • CIEL (‚≠ê388) - CIEL Is an Extended Lisp is a collection of dozens of libraries useful for mundane tasks (HTTP, JSON, regexps‚Ä¶). [unclear licence]
    • It also comes as a binary that is able to run scripts from sources. Scripts that use the built-in libraries start fast without a compilation step.
    • in beta as of 2024
  • NEW in 2024 kiln (‚≠ê60) - an infrastructure (managing a hidden multicall binary) to make Lisp scripting efficient and ergonomic. MIT.
    • Kiln makes it practical to write very small scripts. Kiln scripts are fast and cheap to the point where it makes sense to expose even small pieces of Lisp functionality to the shell.

Other scripting utilities / Third-party APIs

  • clawk (‚≠ê54) - an AWK implementation embedded into Common Lisp, to search files for lines and perform specified actions on its fields. BSD-style.
  • lqn (‚≠ê49) - query language and terminal utility for querying and transforming Lisp, JSON and other text files. written in Common Lisp. MIT.
